website_summaries.verdict: Far Cry 4 trades tropical islands for mountains, but otherwise, it offers pretty much the same great shooter experience as its predecessor.
cons: Doesn't really bring anything new to the series

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't even bother.
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to get this to ever work and sucks that you can't do refunds. I have a pretty top of the line HP EliteBook that should have no problems running this. It is stupid that you have to download extra software to be able to download the game. The server was extremely slow and took forever just to leave me disappointed and angry. I tried two other actual desk top computers, neither one of those would get the game to run either. It is a real shame as I remember the original FarCry from close to 10 years ago and it was amazing. I was hoping to kind of bring myself back again. Instead I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Nvisioned

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Problems All Around
customer_reviews.text: After multiple attempts, I was able to get the game to finally run; however, the mouse lag is so bad that the game is un-playable. There are different fixes suggested online, but none of them worked for me. I've given up trying to get a response from support and trying to fix on my own. Amazon will not refund this defective product and their customer service rep, "Shashank" was incredibly terse and rude when I simply asked. Bad experience with the game, the game developer, and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: N. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Best game of the four releases of FC. Beats the first three incrementally, as one would hope. It is not a game you want to finish quickly, but rather savor the time you spend and enjoy it. Yes, it is a remake of FC3, but so much added and done well that you will think of it as a new game where, for the most part, the failings of 1,2 and 3 have been corrected. The addition of the single person helicopter is by far the best addition to a mode of transportation that could they could have done. Fun, fun, fun!
customer_reviews.author: Old Timer

customer_reviews.title: Once I got it running, I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Just started the game but had some issues after installation... I wanted my fellow gamers to know how I got my game to run. When I first installed the game and tried to play, it would lock up after the main menu but before I got to the the game. After tons of research and a few tries, I went in to UPlay and found the verify files menu. After running that, there were multiple bad files. They were repaired and then the game started right up. I hope this helps some of you. So far the game is as fun as Far Cry 3. I changed the keys though to something I'm more comfortable with. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Belasko7

customer_reviews.title: Nice creative use of artistic license with breathtaking views and nicely envisioned open-world gaming medium
customer_reviews.text: This is a very big single player experience. The graphics are a solid improvement over Far Cry 3, but still lack some of the aspects of Far Cry 2 which made that world come alive so much more. There are a lot of things this game does really well and very few it doesn't. I would have liked a slightly different plot but that is my taste. There are many player-directed paths the game can take, but very few of them have an enjoyable result. The only morally ethical outcome is achieved by not playing the game at all! But nobody will pay real money to do that...
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wittik

customer_reviews.title: Best out of the Series, 9/10
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of the FarCry series and loved all of them (minus #1, havn't played it). And by far, this one is my personal favorite. The graphics are just astonishingly well made. The game mechanics have been tweaked closer to perfection. And the variety of wildlife, weaponry, and secondary mission, have been expanded further. The only downside ,(if you can call it that), is the recycled story line. However, if your playing a FarCry game you should expect the FarCry story line! If you hate first person shooters, I recommend you purchase this game solely for the amazing scenery. I have the PC version so perhaps our experiences may vary. Get this game, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great for relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I loved Far Cry 3, needless to say I had to play Far Cry 4. The game is fun, the play mechanics are very similar to other Ubisoft titles, the storyline however was not my favorite, however I still really loved playing the game. I sunk a lot of time in it, inbetween potty training a puppy and trying to not let the puppy eat everything this game was my vent/happy space. I know some including myself disliked the story, but honestly I just really like the gameplay enough to give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Phobia

customer_reviews.title: Finally done. Good game.
customer_reviews.text: Good game. Better than Far Cry 3. Crashed frequently when I got 39% of the way into the game, and I ended up having a bad ram slot on my AsRock H97M board, so I upgraded to a Z97 mini itx doo-dad. Also had to verify files a few times and troubleshoot but my equipment was part of the overall problem( 3 days,many hours). I have to say that as with Far Cry 3, I don't care for the trippy, drug induced moments in this game. Kind of annoying to me and not so much fun. The moments that you have to fight anything borderline mythical is annoying but I suppose the game must be more than just shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Myco

customer_reviews.title: A broad world view and many varied situations
customer_reviews.text: The Far Cry games interest me because they have a lot of action, involve your character in many interesting situations and require your character to do some thinking to solve problems in most situations. The premise of Far Cry 4 is a little foreign to me but forms a good basis for the game. This game has many different types of situations and problems for your character to become involved in and the game worlds are huge and highly developed. I liked this game better than the other Far Cry games, but it does require a significant investement of time.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Good game but customer service and U-play killed it.
customer_reviews.text: Ubisoft's customer service is the worst. I had a problem after buying the Yetis content. Because I had more than one account with U-play all my games became unplayable. I went through a difficult communication with customer service and got no help, just responses that show they didn't read my comments. I will NEVER buy another ubisoft product. NEVER. The game was fun but now I can't play it. You can't call them because they don't have a phone number to reach them. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Nietman

customer_reviews.title: Far Cry 4 is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Alienware M17x R4 with a NVIDIA GeoForce GTX 680m laptop. I purchased this game hoping for the best and wow, did I get it! I set the video settings to Ultra...and this game is absolutely beautiful! Once I started it I couldn't stop...I was immediately thrown into the story line. I just wanted to let everyone know that this IS a game that runs perfectly smooth on my 680m GeoForce card on Ultra settings with NO hiccups, or crashes. It is by far the best looking and smoothest game I have played yet on my laptop. After playing Far Cry 3, I couldn't wait to try this version...it was so worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!  Right in there with the previous editions.  Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm old in the world of computer gaming. Lets just say I was already old when Duke Nukem was released. What I like about this game series is the story line. It's not too futuristic and actually it's pretty close to any CIA operator's best case scenario. So it's fun. It doesn't demand too much of my time and I get to play it when I'm looking for a good distraction between surgeries. It takes my mind off the pain and it gives me good reason to NOT take the pain meds - which would make it that much more difficult to stay alive in the game.
customer_reviews.author: D. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Quite enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: This game is pretty solid. I miss the chaos of Vaas in Far Cry 3 but Pagan Min seems to be an acceptable replacement. Far Cry 4 maintains the random animal attacks however, they are much more embarrassing now as instead of a crocodile, one might be attacked by a honey badger. There is a lot to do so the story does not seem too short. The game arrived in discs and was easy to install, however, I still hate the requirement to go through Uplay which is quite inconvenient for a Steam gamer. Also, Windows 10 users beware as this game has refused to start multiple times since I downloaded the new OS. Overall though, solid game.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Tate

customer_reviews.title: Play Far Cry 3 first
customer_reviews.text: If you've played Far Cry 3, this is basically more of the same, except in the mountains instead of on an island. Exact same gameplay: bad guy that needs to be defeated by capturing his outposts, bags that need to be upgraded by hunting wild animals, and even more towers to climb. The main difference between the two is that Far Cry 3 has a more interesting bad guy and that this one has a psychedelic experience (which I was not a fan of). Only purchase on sale, and if you played Far Cry 3 and really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so much...
customer_reviews.text: I love all the Crysis games... and Halo is OK... I have been searching for a long time (years) to find anything... anything else at all... that was as good. But no... Just can't get into it... I really thought this might be it. Does not hold my interest.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good game

A lot like Far cry 3, which I loved so I'm in love with this game as well, but not too worry, theres plenty of new things about it too. Looks amazing on my GTX 970 @ 1.5Ghz and 1440P monitor. Looses half a star for early problems with key mappings that absolutely should be been caught in testing for release. Looses the other 1.5 stars for not being sellable used. If I blow $60 for a game, I would like to be able to sell it used when I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: apple_guy

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to Kyrat
customer_reviews.text: Far Cry 3 The Second Coming is what this should be called. Now that's not a bad thing. I very much enjoyed Far Cry 3. But this is more or less the same thing with a new location and psycho bad guy. Overall I played it through to the end. My only wish was that the second half of the island was longer and offered a little more variety to keep things interesting. But over all 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars for incredible graphics. 1 star for story ...

I tried to play with controller but do better with mouse and keyboard and works great that way for me. Easy to play. I was worried about stealth parts of the game as not usually a fan of that, but totally workable. Def a good game to play to pass some time if you like FPS shooters.
customer_reviews.author: John Rayner

customer_reviews.title: the only real differences are that the wildlife is generally far more annoying and they've added another form of currency with r
customer_reviews.text: This game is almost identical to its predecessor, FC3. In fact, the only real differences are that the wildlife is generally far more annoying and they've added another form of currency with regards to the Karma reputation. Otherwise, everything plays almost identical to FC3 between the gameplay and the story. If you loved FC3, this game is right up your alley.

customer_reviews.title: The arena fighting is fun. The gyro copter is useful for covering large ...
customer_reviews.text: Having a blast playing this game. The map is huge, it will take some time to finish. Plus all the extra missions and areas to discover helps to break any monotony I get playing the main story line. The arena fighting is fun. The gyro copter is useful for covering large areas quickly. Graphics are great. If you liked FarCry 3, this one will feel very familiar and just as fun.
customer_reviews.author: KenandKarin

I honestly thought that even though Vaas from Far Cry 3 wasn't the primary antagonist, he was far more memorable than any of the characters in Far Cry 4. I mean they try with Pagan Min, but for some reason I just don't buy into it.

customer_reviews.title: A great game HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: A great game HOWEVER... you should know that it is NOT fully COOP. you can run repeatable missions and some low level stuff but you cannot play the main story in COOP mode - also after you get to a certain point the game forces you to do arenas and other specialty gamelets to access over half the map. my brother and i cleared every point and picked up every artifact on the map and leveled all our crafting, yet we cant progress any further

I would recommend this top-notch first person shooter to anyone. The best thing I liked about the game was the addition of the rotorcopter. Combine it with a grenade launcher and you are one tough guy! I bought my copy on Amazon on sale for $39. What a bargain.

customer_reviews.title: Even Better than Far Cry 3

The nearly endless side adventures and the open world design were great, but Far Cry 4 takes that even further. I like the guns, the vehicles and the story line. Still playing it even though I realize it has a somewhat dark ending.
customer_reviews.author: Frankc1224

customer_reviews.title: Needs Improvement, but a great game!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike Far Cry 3, Far Cry 4 's controls are not user friendly and instructions are badly lacking. At this time, 2/25/2015, there still are bugs in the game. Having said that, if you bear through all the glitches and figure out the controls, the game is very much like Far Cry 3 except greater graphics and challenges. Once they remove the bugs and improve player controls, it will be a great game to play.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W. Padgett

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun game to play
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game to play, and the use of Co-op makes it far more entertaining. If you're familiar with the outposts in FarCry 3, a lot of this game centers around overtaking outposts in order to clear the map. But in the new game you can re-play the same outpost even after you conquer it. The graphics are also really neat, and a huge step up over FarCry 3.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schneider

customer_reviews.title: ... is one of the few games that you can enjoy 1000 of hours of game time
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the very few games that you can enjoy over a 1000 hours of game time. Missions, side missions, huge map to explore, great graphics, driving different types of vehicles and my favorite, great sniper rifles and much more... the FarCry development did not let us know down since their first release. Great job... love it

customer_reviews.text: I am not sure I like this game more than FC3, but I like it a lot! The graphics are amazing; beautiful and detailed, with clouds and mists drifting by that look real. You really need a good video card to take full advantage of the beauty of the game. There are a couple things I find annoying...cut scenes can't be skipped once you have seen them, so if you fail, or don't complete the mission, you may have to watch a long movie several times. This is a challenging game with lots of cool stuff in it, and enough changes from previous versions that I will get many hours of fun...well worth the money

product_meta.title: Far Cry 4 - PC
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:StandardSEQUEL TO THE #1 RATED SHOOTER OF 2012*

Built from the legendary DNA of its award-winning predecessor, Far Cry 4 delivers the most expansive and immersive Far Cry experience ever in an entirely new and massive open world. With integrated drop-in/drop-out open world co-op play, Far Cry 4 re-imagines the cooperative experience for the next generation. You’ll now be able to discover and explore the living open world of Kyrat together.

Hidden in the towering Himalayas lies Kyrat, a country steeped in tradition and violence. You are Ajay Ghale. Traveling to Kyrat to fulfill your mother’s dying wish, you find yourself caught up in a civil war to overthrow the oppressive regime of dictator Pagan Min. Explore and navigate this vast open world, where danger and unpredictability lurk around every corner. Here, every decision counts, and every second is a story. Welcome to Kyrat.

*Based on Metacritic as of 12/18/2012
feature_bullets: REVOLUTIONARY OPEN WORLD CO-OP: Far Cry 4 allows for a second player to drop in and out at any point, re-imagining the cooperative experience in the true spirit of Far Cry for the next generation.
MASSIVE OPEN WORLD: Discover the most diverse Far Cry world ever created. With terrain spanning from lush forests to the snowcapped Himalayas, the entire world is alive…and deadly.
ABUNDANT NEW WILDLIFE: From leopards, rhinos, black eagles, and vicious honey badgers, as you embark on your hunt for resources, know that something may be hunting you...

NEW WAYS TO GET AROUND: Scout enemy territory from above in the all-new gyrocopter and then plummet back to earth in your wing suit. Climb aboard the back of a six-ton elephant and unleash its raw power on your enemies.
POWERFUL NEW WEAPONS: Choose the right weapon for the job, no matter how insane or unpredictable that job might be. With a diverse arsenal, you’ll be prepared for anything.
